questions.question_text: Which of the following methods minimizes the system interaction when gathering information to conduct a vulnerability assessment of a router?

discussion.content: CompTIA exam writers deserve to be ******* shot

Answer: A
Explanation:
The configuration download can be done with a scanner.
Provided answer is correct
correct .key word " gathering information"

I guess assessing the vulnerability of the router by going over the configurations is what this means. Not necessarily running a vulnerability scan. Making sure all the security configurations are in place, ACL permissions, credentials, etc.

 "Minimizing system interaction" makes this option viable.
Correct,because you will perform a passive scanning of the system

discussion.content: shouldn't be D ?

comments.content: Did you pass the exam man? I'm wanna ask you something if you have time.

NEVER USES WORD SCAN!! AND D will not decrease the interaction with the system. you can read the configs off a printed piece of paper to assess vulnerabilities ! choices.B: It eliminates the possibility of privilege escalation attacks against the local VM host.
choices.D: It restricts the access of the software to a contained logical space and limits possible damage.
choices.A: It allows the software to run in an unconstrained environment with full network access.
choices.C: It facilitates the analysis of possible malware by allowing it to run until resources are exhausted.

discussion.content: Just bear in mind that software is being tested here, nothing to do with analysing a malware.
Another point is that B says a VM or sandboxing eliminates the possibility of an attack on the host. That's not true. Nothing is 100% secure. So it can't be B.

Damage doesn't only include viruses and what not. What if installing the program messes up the machine by applying faulty drivers and corrupting files? On a VM all you have to do is roll back to a previous snapshot and done. This is why the answer is D.
I narrowed this down to B and D and I'm still not entirely sure why it's not B...

comments.content: D is the first choice/best option. B is also a good shout but D holds more weight.
Question also doesn't mention anything about VMs. So D would be "Moar gooder" answer.
